name: CASE_DRG_ID
description: The CASE_DRG_ID table contains information about the diagnosis related group (DRG) codes associated with case records.

columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the case record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: DRG_ID
columns.description: Specifies the diagnosis related group (DRG) code.

columns.name: DRG_ID_DRG_NAME
columns.description: The name of the Diagnoses Related Group name.
